## KeyValueRepository.get() method

Get an entry by key

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(key: string, options?: Options): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | Key for the entry |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<T>`

A promise of the entry
